Package com.marginallyclever.makelangelo

Class Translator

java.lang.Object
com.marginallyclever.makelangelo.Translator
public final class Translator
extends java.lang.Object
MultilingualSupport is the translation engine. You ask for a string it finds the matching string in the currently selected language.
Author:
Dan Royer, Peter Colapietro See XML and Java - Parsing XML using Java Tutorial

    • loadLanguages

      public static void loadLanguages()
      Scan folder for language files. See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1429172/how-do-i-list-the-files-inside-a-jar-file
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - No language files found

    • get

      public static java.lang.String get​(java.lang.String key)
      Parameters:
      key - name of key to find in translation list
      Returns:
      the translated value for key, or "missing:key".

    • get

      public static java.lang.String get​(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String[] params)
      Translates a string and fills in some details. String contains the special character sequence "%N", where N is the n-th parameter passed to get() A %1 is replaced with the first parameter, %2 with the second, and so on. There is no escape character.
      Parameters:
      key - name of key to find in translation list
      params -
      Returns:
      the translated value for key, or "missing:key".

    • getLanguageList

      public static java.lang.String[] getLanguageList()
      Returns:
      the list of language names

    • setCurrentLanguage

      public static void setCurrentLanguage​(java.lang.String currentLanguage)
      Parameters:
      currentLanguage - the name of the language to make active.

    • getCurrentLanguageIndex

      public static int getCurrentLanguageIndex()
